name: Personal Site
description:
Follow me as I work on my portfolio website. Mess and all.

Big rework based on the plan to have the development happen iteratively. Kinda like the cleaner look. I know a lot of people like the icons, and I do as well. I have some ideas how to bring them back, but that's a future thing.

Worked through some iterations and thinking through the about page as well.
